index.encabezado: Connecting technology, security and sustainability to drive your business success
index.descripciondeServicios: Find all the technological solutions to boost and optimize the productivity of your business
index.descriptionServicio6: Structured cabling certification. We offer services that ensure that network cabling systems meet international quality and performance standards.
index.descripcionVideo: We are a company in constant evolution. We offer connectivity experiences and technological solutions
index.sectionAvanzar: We are united by the desire to move forward.
index.descriptionAvanzar: We empower the digital lives of people and communities by connecting them to what matters most
index.descriptionQuienesSomos: Welcome to AMF Tech, a leader at the forefront of technological innovation. Since our humble beginnings, we have been dedicated to providing state-of-the-art technology solutions to meet our clients' needs in a digitally dynamic world. With a team of passionate experts and a proven track record of success, we are committed to driving progress and excellence in all aspects of our services. Discover how AMF Tech can take your business to the next level in the digital age.
index.descriptionTrayectoria: At AMF Tech we have witnessed an exciting and rewarding journey. From our humble beginnings until today, we have maintained an unwavering commitment to excellence and innovation. With every challenge overcome and every obstacle faced, we have strengthened our position as a leader in the installation, commissioning and maintenance of industrial networks, electronic security and renewable energy. Guided by our core values of integrity and quality, we are eager to continue to grow and exceed our customers' expectations. Looking ahead, we are excited for the future and the opportunity to follow
index.descriptionCompromiso: Our company strives to be the end-to-end technology and telecommunications partner for businesses, providing innovative, secure and sustainable solutions that drive growth and operational efficiency in today's business world.
index.descriptionOp1: AMF TECH provides comprehensive and technologically advanced solutions in the field of communications, video surveillance systems, electricity and renewable energy to improve the quality of life of our customers and contribute to the sustainable development of society. Its multidisciplinary team has an experience of more than 15 years in different fields.
index.descriptionOp2: AMF TECH's goal is innovation and excellence in services and products related to communications, video surveillance systems, electricity and renewable energies, actively contributing to a more connected, secure and sustainable world.
index.nuestroCompromisoCotidiano: WE ARE COMMITTED TO DAILY COMMITMENT
index.descriptionOp1cc: We continue to evolve to transform our customers' digital experience by offering them a secure, flexible and dynamic service.
index.descriptionOp2cc: We guarantee high-speed fixed and mobile connections, for access from any device
index.descriptionOp3cc: Our principles, values, moral and ethical foundations promote transparency in our actions. Get to know our Code of Ethics and Conduct and our Anti-Corruption, Anti-Fraud and Conflict of Interest Policies
index.descriptionv1: We strive to offer products and services of the highest quality, meeting the highest standards of excellence in every aspect of our work.
index.descriptionv2: We are constantly looking for new and better ways to address our customers‘ challenges, leveraging the most advanced technology and industry best practices.
index.descriptionv3: We are committed to customer satisfaction, integrity in our actions and respect for the environment in everything we do.
index.descriptionv4: We foster a collaborative work environment where teamwork, open communication and the exchange of ideas are fundamental to achieving our goals.
index.descriptionv5: We are committed to promoting the responsible use of natural resources and to developing solutions that contribute to the conservation of the environment and the sustainable development of the communities in which we operate.
index.descriptionv6: Our principles, values, moral and ethical foundations promote the transparency of our actions.
index.p1PP: At AMF TECH, we are committed to excellence in the quality of our products and services, as well as to the protection of the environment in all our operations. Our policy is based on the following fundamental principles:
index.p2PP: Compliance with requirements: We are committed to complying with all legal, regulatory and contractual requirements applicable to our activities, products and services. In addition, we strive to exceed our customers' expectations through the timely and consistent delivery of high quality products and services.
index.p3PP: Continuous improvement: We promote a culture of continuous improvement throughout the organization by identifying areas of opportunity, implementing corrective and preventive actions, and regularly reviewing our quality management system. We encourage the active participation of our employees in identifying opportunities for improvement and implementing quality practices and processes.
index.p4PP: Responsible environmental management: We are committed to minimizing the environmental impact of our operations, products and services by adopting sustainable practices and technologies, preventing pollution and conserving natural resources.
index.p5PP: Legal and regulatory compliance: We comply with all applicable environmental laws, regulations and standards in all our operating activities. In addition, we promote environmental awareness and compliance among our employees, suppliers and contractors.
index.p6PP: Innovation and green technology: We seek to develop products and services that contribute to environmental conservation and climate change mitigation. We promote the use of renewable energies, clean technologies and eco-friendly practices in all our operations.
index.p7PP: To ensure compliance with this policy, we establish specific quality and environmental objectives and targets, which are reviewed periodically to ensure their relevance and effectiveness. In addition, we communicate this policy to all our employees, suppliers and relevant stakeholders, and provide the necessary training and resources for its effective implementation. At AMF TECH, we are committed to being a leader in quality and sustainability, working responsibly for the benefit of our customers, employees and the environment.
index.p1RSC: AMF TECH's social and cooperative responsibility is a fundamental pillar of our corporate philosophy. We are committed to contributing positively to the well-being of society and to sustainable development, both locally and globally. Some of the actions we take in this regard include:
index.p2RSC: We support local initiatives that promote education, health, economic development, and social inclusion. Whether through donations, corporate volunteer programs, or collaborations with non-profit organizations, we seek to improve the quality of life in the communities in which we operate.
index.p3RSC: We are committed to operating in an ethical and transparent manner in all our business activities. We promote fair business practices, respecting human, labor and environmental rights in all our operations and supply chain.
index.p4RSC: We promote social innovation as a way to address social and environmental challenges through technological and business solutions. We collaborate with entrepreneurs, academic institutions and other companies to develop and promote innovative solutions that generate a positive impact on society.
index.p5RSC: We believe in the power of collaboration and cooperation to generate positive change. We collaborate with other companies, governmental and non-governmental organizations, as well as civil society, to address social and environmental challenges jointly and effectively.
index.p6RSC: In summary, at AMF TECH we are committed to being an agent of positive change in society, promoting sustainability, inclusion and human development in all our activities and business relationships.
index.descriptionServicios: We offer comprehensive solutions in telecommunications, technology and energy. Discover our services designed to improve your connectivity, optimize your systems and boost your business.
index.descriptionServicio1: We provide you with a work team formed by engineers and technical personnel that will give solutions to any electrical requirement of industrial type.
index.descriptionServicio2: We offer a full suite of security services ranging from video intelligence to access control, providing complete protection for your business and assets.
index.descriptionServicio3: As an internet operator, we offer a variety of services designed to meet the needs of businesses of all sizes.
index.descriptionServicio4: We offer specialized communications consulting, tailoring solutions to meet each customer's specific challenge.
index.descriptionServicio5: Services for fixed solar plants and trackers: Project assembly, operation and maintenance service, assistance, technical support, design and construction of solar home systems.
index.tituloAsesoria: In AMF we advise you according to your needs
index.descripcionAsesoria1: We help transform and empower your company, we design solutions that integrate knowledge and technology that drive the evolution of business processes.
index.descripcionAsesoria2: The power of our alliances allows us to achieve a high level of technological updating. We permanently monitor potential strategic partners.
index.descripcionAsesoria3: We are an interdisciplinary team of professionals who seek to continuously improve and add value by focusing on our clients. Join our staff.
index.descripcionTrabajaConNosotros: Join our team at AMFTech, a leading company in technology and services in the fields of communications, video surveillance systems, electricity and renewable energies. If you are looking for opportunities to grow professionally and contribute to innovative projects, you could be the person we are looking for!
index.porqueElegirnos: DO YOU WANT TO JOIN THE TEAM?
index.descriptionPorqueElegirnos: If you believe you have the skills and motivation to be part of our team, we invite you to send your resume and a cover letter highlighting your experience and your motivations to join AMFTech. You can send your application to our human resources department via our website or email. We are committed to providing an inclusive, collaborative and professionally growing work environment where every employee has the opportunity to reach their full potential and contribute to the company's success and feel at home. We look forward to receiving your application and meeting you soon!
index.servicioL2Desc: Work together with a motivated and passionate team
index.servicioL4Desc: Working on innovative projects that make a difference
index.porqueunirte: WHY JOIN THE AMF TECH TEAM?
index.descripcionContacto: For all inquiries send us an email through the following form
index.comunicacionesDescription: Communication Solutions for your Business. We specialize in providing advanced and customized communication solutions to meet the unique needs of our business customers. From networking and telephony to video conferencing and communications security, we are here to keep your business connected efficiently and securely.
index.Consultoria1a: We evaluate your communication requirements to offer you the best solution.
index.Consultoria2a: Detailed plans for networking, telephony and other communication services tailored to your specific needs.
index.Redesa: Local Area Networks (LAN): Design, installation and configuration of internal networks to ensure reliable and fast connectivity within your company.`
index.Despliegue1a: We implement high quality network cables, such as twisted pair and fiber optic cable, according to design specifications.
index.Despliegue1b: We install strategically located connection points to ensure efficient connectivity throughout your business space.
index.Despliegue1c: We assemble and organize racks and cabinets to house your network equipment in a safe and orderly manner.
index.Despliegue1d: We implement cable management solutions to minimize clutter and facilitate maintenance and troubleshooting.
index.Despliegue1e: We provide certificates of compliance to ensure that your infrastructure meets industry standards.
index.Despliegue1f: Deployment of robust, high-speed WiFi solutions with wide coverage and advanced security.
index.Despliegue1g: Implementation of secure and efficient connections between multiple locations to facilitate communication between branches.
index.TelefoniaCard1p: Installation and maintenance of advanced telephone systems, including traditional PBX and cloud-based solutions.
index.TelefoniaCard2p: Implementation of Internet communication solutions to offer greater flexibility, functionality and cost savings.
index.VideoconferenciaCard1p: Installation and support for high-quality videoconferencing solutions, enabling effective virtual meetings and real-time collaboration.
index.VideoconferenciaCard2p: Implementation of collaborative software and platforms that facilitate communication and collaboration between work teams, even remotely.
index.SeguridadCard1p: Deployment of advanced encryption technologies to protect your sensitive data and communications from unauthorized access.
index.SeguridadCard2p: Configuration of virtual private networks to establish secure connections and protect information transmitted over public networks.
index.MantenimientoCard1p: Periodic reviews and updates to ensure the proper functioning of all communication systems.
index.MantenimientoCard2p: Continuous technical assistance and prompt attention to any problem that may arise, available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
index.beneficios1p: Keep your communications operational at all times, with solutions designed for maximum reliability.
index.beneficios2p: Adaptation to the changing needs of your business, with scalable solutions that grow with you.
index.beneficios3p: Advanced protection for your data and communications, with security measures designed to keep your information safe at all times.
index.beneficios4p: Efficient technologies and cloud-based solutions that reduce your communications expenses and improve your return on investment.
index.Eleginos1p: Our team of communications experts provides you with personalized advice and recommendations based on your specific needs.
index.Eleginos2p: We offer live demonstrations of our solutions, so you can see how they work in practice and make informed decisions.
index.Eleginos3p: Creamos soluciones a medida que se adaptan a sus necesidades y presupuesto, para proporcionarle la mejor experiencia de comunicación posible.
index.Eleginos4p: We offer complete packages that include installation, maintenance and technical support, so you can get everything you need in one place.
index.Eleginos5p: We also offer financing options to facilitate the implementation of your communication solutions, with flexible plans that fit your budget.
index.tendencia1p: The implementation of 5G technology is revolutionizing mobile communications, offering faster speeds and greater data capacity for even faster and more reliable connectivity.
index.tendencia2p: The integration of multiple communication tools into a single unified platform is gaining popularity, enabling smoother and more efficient collaboration between distributed work teams.
index.tendencia3p: Communications security remains a key concern, with an increasing focus on protection against cyber threats and the implementation of advanced security measures.
index.tendencia4p: The trend toward remote work continues to grow, and communication solutions that facilitate collaboration and productivity from anywhere are in high demand.
index.portadaElectricidad: At AMFTech, where innovation and energy efficiency merge to drive industrial progress. In our electrical section, you will be immersed in an environment dedicated to cutting-edge electrical solutions for industry. From control and automation systems to the design and implementation of industrial electrical networks.
index.ofElectricidad1Description: We provide you with a work team formed by engineers and technical personnel that will give solutions to any industrial electrical requirement.
index.ofElectricidad2Description: Government buildings, schools, hospitals, stadiums, shopping malls complying with specific safety and regulatory requirements.
index.ofElectricidad3Description: Low voltage electrical installations to integrate and distribute energy generated by renewable sources to existing electrical grids.
index.ofElectricidad4Description: Power supply systems for machinery, process control systems, industrial lighting systems.
index.ofElectricidad5Description: These installations include wiring for data networks, telephone systems, security systems, access control systems.
index.ofElectricidad6Description: Low voltage electrical installations for homes, buildings and apartments.
index.saiDescription: It is an essential device that protects sensitive electronic equipment against power outages and fluctuations in electrical current. It provides continuous electrical power during outages, ensuring that devices continue to operate smoothly.
index.saiCard1Description: Offers maximum protection, as the equipment is always powered by the battery, providing continuous, filtered power.
index.saiCard2Description: The equipment is powered directly from the mains and only uses the battery in case of failure or anomaly in the supply.
index.saiCard3Description: Switches to battery only when it detects a power interruption, providing a fast and efficient response.
index.armariosCard1Description: Used to house electrical distribution components, such as circuit breakers, safety switches, and fuses.
index.armariosCard2Description: Designed to house electrical control components, such as relays, contactors, timers, PLCs (Programmable Logic Controllers), and other industrial automation devices.
index.armariosCard3Description: Used to house telecommunications equipment, such as network switches, routers, servers, and other connectivity devices. They are common in data networking environments, data centers, and telecommunications systems.
index.armariosCard4Description: Estos armarios albergan instrumentos de medición y control, como transmisores de temperatura, presión, caudal, nivel, y otros parámetros. Se utilizan en aplicaciones donde se requiere monitoreo y control preciso de variables físicas en procesos industriales y sistemas de gestión de edificios.
index.armariosCard5Description: These cabinets house measurement and control instruments, such as transmitters for temperature, pressure, flow, level, and other parameters. They are used in applications where precise monitoring and control of physical variables is required in industrial processes and building management systems.
index.armariosCard6Description: In addition to the above types, there are cabinets designed for specialized applications, such as explosion-proof cabinets for hazardous environments, climate-controlled cabinets for extreme environments, IP (dust and water) rated cabinets for outdoor applications, among others.
index.bateriasDescription: Our batteries are engineered to the highest standards of quality and reliability to deliver optimum performance in any environment. From traditional lead-acid batteries to cutting-edge technologies such as lithium-ion batteries, we have the right solution to meet your company's specific needs.
index.bateriasServices2: Replacement of aged or defective batteries
index.bateriasServices4: Implementation of best practices to extend the life of your backup power systems.
index.puntoDeCargaDescription: At AMFTech, we are at the forefront of the electric mobility revolution, offering innovative and reliable solutions for charging electric vehicles anywhere, anytime. Our range of charging points is designed to meet the needs of individual drivers, businesses and communities, facilitating the transition to a more sustainable future.
index.energiasRenovablesDescription: At AMF TECH we offer a wide range of services designed to facilitate the transition towards the use of renewable energies. Our goal is to provide integral solutions that adapt to the needs of each client, guaranteeing efficiency, sustainability and energy savings.
index.ConsultoriaER1a: We perform an exhaustive analysis of the current energy consumption of your home or business.
index.ConsultoriaER1b: We identify areas for improvement and propose customized solutions to optimize energy use.
index.ConsultoriaER2a: We develop detailed plans for the implementation of renewable energy systems.
index.ConsultoriaER2b: We advise on the technical and economic feasibility of projects, ensuring that they meet your objectives and budget.
index.ConsultoriaER3a: We guide you through the local and national rules and regulations related to renewable energies.
index.ConsultoriaER3b: We ensure that your project complies with all legal and environmental requirements.
index.operacion1a: Design and installation of photovoltaic and thermal solar panels.
index.operacion1b: Configuration of solar energy storage systems
index.operacion1c: Commissioning and start-up of solar plants.
index.operacion3a: Regular inspections and preventive maintenance to ensure optimal performance of your systems.
index.operacion3b: Repair service and replacement of defective components.
index.Financiacion1a: We help you explore and obtain financing options for your renewable energy project.
index.Financiacion1b: We collaborate with banks and financial institutions to offer affordable payment plans.
index.Financiacion2a: We identify grants and subsidies available at local, national and European level.
index.Financiacion2b: We manage the entire grant application process to maximize funding opportunities.
index.Soluciones1a: We offer integrated solutions that include design, installation, and maintenance of renewable energy systems.
index.Soluciones1b: We take care of all stages of the project, from planning to start-up.
index.Soluciones2a: We design hybrid systems that combine different renewable energy sources to maximize efficiency.
index.Soluciones2b: Integration of renewable energy systems with the existing electrical grid.
index.Soluciones3a: We implement solutions to improve energy efficiency in residential, commercial and industrial buildings.
index.Soluciones3b: Energy audits and recommendations to reduce energy consumption and costs.
index.Soporte1a: Technical assistance available 24/7 to solve any problem or query.
index.Soporte1b: Dedicated customer service to ensure your satisfaction.
index.Soporte2a: Real-time monitoring systems to supervise the performance of your facilities.
index.Soporte2b: Periodic reporting and data analysis to optimize energy use.
index.Soporte3a: We evaluate and upgrade obsolete renewable energy systems to improve their efficiency and capacity.
index.Soporte3b: Proposals for technological upgrades to keep your facilities up to date with the latest advances.
index.operadorDescription: As an Internet operator, we offer a variety of connectivity services designed to meet the needs of businesses of all sizes.
index.Conectividad1a: Fiber Optics: We offer ultra-fast Internet connections through fiber optic technology, providing symmetrical speeds and exceptional stability.
index.Conectividad1b: Wireless Internet (Radio): We also provide high-speed wireless internet access using radio technology, ideal for locations where traditional wiring is not an option.
index.Conectividad2a: Scalable Bandwidth: We design scalable internet plans that adapt to the specific needs of your business, from small businesses to large corporations.
index.Conectividad2b: Managed Services: We offer managed services that include proactive monitoring, technical support and regular updates to ensure optimal performance of your Internet connection.
index.Conectividad3a: Firewalls and Threat Protection: We implement advanced security measures to protect your network against cyber attacks and safeguard the integrity of your data.
index.Conectividad3b: Guaranteed SLA: We back our offer with a Service Level Agreement (SLA) that guarantees the availability and performance of your Internet connection.
index.Conectividad4a: Continuous Assistance: Our technical support team is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to help you with any problem or question related to your Internet connection.
index.Conectividad4b: Rapid Problem Resolution: We are committed to providing fast and effective solutions to minimize any disruption to your business due to connectivity problems.
index.beneficios1Op: We guarantee a stable and reliable internet connection so your business can run smoothly.
index.beneficios2Op: We offer exceptional download and upload speeds so you can perform online tasks efficiently.
index.beneficios3Op: We protect your network against cyber threats and ensure the integrity of your data.
index.beneficios4Op: We are here to help you anytime, day or night, with our 24-hour technical support team.
index.EleginosO1p: We have extensive experience in the telecommunications industry and expertise in the delivery of internet services.
index.EleginosO2p: We strive to offer the highest quality internet services, backed by state-of-the-art infrastructure and a dedicated team.
index.EleginosO3p: We take the time to understand your unique business needs and design customized solutions to fit them.
index.EleginosO4p: We maintain a focus on innovation and continuous improvement to ensure that you are always one step ahead in terms of technology and performance.
index.seguridad: Video Surveillance, Alarms and Access Control Services
index.portadaSeguridad: We offer a complete set of security services ranging from video surveillance to access control, providing complete protection for your company and your assets.
index.cardSeg1a: Security Cameras: We have a wide range of cameras, including fixed, PTZ, night vision and high resolution cameras, designed to capture every detail with clarity..
index.cardSeg1b: Recorders and Storage: We offer state-of-the-art DVRs and NVRs as well as cloud storage solutions to ensure that your recordings are always available and secure.
index.cardSeg1c: Monitors and Management Software: We provide monitors and advanced software that allows the management and visualization of your cameras in real time, as well as video analysis to detect suspicious activities.
index.cardSeg2a: Card and Key Fob Systems: We implement access control systems with cards and electronic key fobs for a secure and efficient control of entrances and exits.
index.cardSeg2b: Biometric Access: We offer advanced access control solutions using fingerprint, facial recognition and other biometric methods that ensure a high level of security.
index.cardSeg2c: Visitor Management: We provide systems for the management and registration of visitors, facilitating the control and tracking of all persons entering your facilities..
index.cardSeg3a: Burglar Alarms: We install advanced alarm systems that detect intrusions immediately and activate alerts to prevent theft.
index.cardSeg3b: Fire Detection: We provide smoke detection and fire alarm systems that react quickly to minimize risk and damage.
index.cardSeg3c: Technical Alarms: We offer alarms to detect gas leaks, water leaks and other technical incidents, protecting your property from potential damage.
index.cardN1p: Preventive and 24/7: Periodic revisions and continuous assistance.
index.cardN2p: 24/7 Monitoring Center: Constant supervision and rapid response.
index.cardN3a: Cohesive Systems: Integration of video surveillance, alarms and access controls.
index.cardN3b: Latest Technology: Constant updating of systems.
index.beneficiosV2: Peace of mind: Comprehensive protection of your property.
index.beneficiosV3: Operational Efficiency: Better supervision and control.
index.beneficiosV4: Visual and Event Evidence: Detailed recordings and logs.
index.certificacionesDescription: AMF TECH is a company specialized in structured cabling certification. It offers services that ensure that network cabling systems meet international quality and performance standards.
index.Certificaciones1p: AMF TECH certifies that the cabling supports the intended applications and protocols, guaranteeing optimum performance.
index.Certificaciones2p: It ensures that the cabling complies with TIA/EIA and ISO/IEC standards, which is crucial for interoperability and compatibility.
index.Certificaciones3p: Identifies and corrects problems during installation, minimizing failures and downtime.
index.Certificaciones4p: Provides detailed reports and network maps, useful for maintenance and future expansions.
index.Certificaciones5p: Helps avoid additional costs by preventing the need to redo deficient installations.
index.Certificaciones6p: Offering an AMF TECH certified system increases confidence in the quality of the work.
index.Certificaciones7p: Validation of manufacturers' warranties, ensuring support in case of future problems.
index.Certificaciones8p: Ensures that the cabling system is ready to support future technology upgrades.
index.Certificacionesdescdown: AMF TECH is positioned as a reliable partner to ensure the quality and reliability of structured cabling systems.
